hero.hero_title: Let's Work Together to Create Wonders with OKY
hero.hero_paragraph: At OKY WebCraft, we create professional and optimized digital solutions tailored to your needs. From modern websites to full-stack applications, our team delivers exceptional results that drive success.

about.about_description: We help optimize your social efforts for impactful and meaningful results.

chooseUs.tailored_description: We provide customized strategies that align perfectly with your business objectives, ensuring maximum impact.
chooseUs.reliable_description: Backed by years of experience, our team delivers consistent, high-quality results that you can count on.
chooseUs.innovative_description: We embrace innovation to provide cutting-edge solutions that keep you ahead of the competition.

careers.title: Meet Our Team
careers.subtitle: At OKY WebCraft, we are a passionate team of developers, designers, and innovators, each with unique skills that contribute to our collective success.
careers.fileError: Only PDF and DOCX files are allowed.
careers.fileSizeError: File size must be at least 10MB.

privacy_policy.intro_text: Welcome to OKY WebCraft! We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and share your information when you use our services.
privacy_policy.information_text: We may collect the following types of information:
information_list: Personal Information (e.g., name, email address, phone number)
Usage Data (e.g., pages you visit, time spent on the site)
Device Information (e.g., browser type, IP address)
privacy_policy.use_text: The information we collect is used for:
privacy_policy.sharing_text: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information with third parties only in the following cases:
sharing_list: To protect our rights and safety
privacy_policy.rights_text: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. If you have any questions or concerns, please contact us at [your email or contact information].
privacy_policy.changes_text: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Please check back periodically for updates.
privacy_policy.footer_text: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at our email below ↓

terms_of_service.intro_text: Welcome to OKY WebCraft. By using our services, you agree to the following terms and conditions.
terms_of_service.use_text: You agree to use our services only for lawful purposes. You must not use our services in any way that violates any applicable laws or regulations.
terms_of_service.account_text: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and for all activities that occur under your account.
terms_of_service.content_text: All content provided by you remains your property. However, by using our services, you grant us a license to use, display, and distribute your content within the platform.
terms_of_service.termination_text: We may suspend or terminate your access to the service at any time if you violate these terms or engage in inappropriate conduct.
terms_of_service.limitation_text: We are not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use of our services.
terms_of_service.privacy_text: Your use of the service is also governed by our Privacy Policy.
terms_of_service.changes_text: We may update these terms from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated date.
terms_of_service.contact_text: If you have any questions about these terms, please contact us at okywebcraft@gmail.com.

cloud_services.title: Cloud Services & Hosting
cloud_services.description: Optimize your infrastructure with OKY Agency. We provide reliable cloud hosting & services ensuring scalability, security, and high performance.
cloud_services.scalable_hosting_description: Ensure high availability with cloud-based solutions that scale with demand.
cloud_services.robust_security_description: Advanced security measures for data protection, encryption, and DDoS mitigation.
cloud_services.performance_optimization_description: Utilize CDNs, caching, and global data centers for blazing-fast performance.

digital_advertising.title: Digital Advertising
digital_advertising.description: Maximize your reach with OKY Agency. We create high-converting digital ad campaigns tailored to your audience, ensuring maximum ROI and business growth.
digital_advertising.targeted_campaigns_description: We deliver highly targeted ads to the right audience, increasing engagement and conversions.
digital_advertising.data_driven_strategies_description: Using analytics & AI, we continuously optimize campaigns for better performance.
digital_advertising.maximized_roi_description: Get the best return on investment by reducing ad waste and increasing conversions.

ecommerce_services.title: Our E-Commerce Services
ecommerce_services.description: At OKY Agency, we specialize in building dynamic, secure, and scalable e-commerce solutions using top platforms like WordPress and Shopify.
ecommerce_services.wordpress_ecommerce_description: We leverage WordPress with WooCommerce to create versatile and user-friendly online stores. Whether you're launching a new business or enhancing your current e-commerce site, we ensure your platform is optimized for both performance and scalability.
ecommerce_services.shopify_ecommerce_description: Shopify is one of the leading e-commerce platforms, and we are experts in building seamless online stores that deliver a superior shopping experience. Our Shopify solutions are tailored to help businesses grow and scale efficiently.
ecommerce_services.process_title: How OKY Agency Helps Level Up Your E-Commerce Project
ecommerce_services.process_description: Our agency is dedicated to creating cutting-edge e-commerce experiences for our clients. We combine expert development with modern technologies to bring your vision to life.
ecommerce_services.discovery_consultation_description: We begin by understanding your business, target market, and goals. Our team works closely with you to define your project scope, preferences, and required features.
ecommerce_services.platform_selection_customization_descrip: Based on your needs, we recommend the best platform, either WordPress/WooCommerce or Shopify. We then customize the platform to ensure it aligns with your brand and functional requirements.
ecommerce_services.development_implementation_description: Our expert developers integrate the necessary features, design custom themes, and implement all required functionalities. We also ensure that your site is fully optimized for speed and security.
ecommerce_services.testing_launch_description: Before launch, we perform thorough testing to ensure everything works seamlessly across devices and browsers. After approval, we officially launch your e-commerce store.
ecommerce_services.ongoing_support_optimization_description: After launch, we provide continuous support to ensure your store runs smoothly. We help with updates, feature enhancements, and SEO optimization to maximize performance.

social_media_management.title: Social Media Management
social_media_management.description: Boost your brand’s online presence with OKY Agency. We handle your social media strategy, content, and engagement to ensure maximum reach and impact.

content_strategy.title: Content Strategy
content_strategy.description: We create engaging content tailored to your audience, ensuring consistency and brand alignment.

analytics_reporting.title: Analytics & Reporting
analytics_reporting.description: Track your social media performance with detailed insights to refine your strategy.

community_engagement.title: Community Engagement
community_engagement.description: Build strong connections with your audience through active interactions and timely responses.

uiux_design.title: UI/UX Design
uiux_design.description: Create stunning, user-friendly interfaces with OKY Agency. We focus on user experience, intuitive navigation, and modern aesthetics to elevate your digital presence.

user_centered_design.title: User-Centered Design
user_centered_design.description: We design with user experience in mind, ensuring accessibility and seamless interactions.

prototyping_wireframing.title: Prototyping & Wireframing
prototyping_wireframing.description: Get a visual blueprint of your application before development starts.

usability_testing.title: Usability Testing
usability_testing.description: Improve user interactions with real feedback and iterative design.

web_mobile_development.title: Web & Mobile Development
web_mobile_development.description: Elevate your digital presence with OKY Agency. We craft high-performance web & mobile applications using the latest technologies, ensuring scalability, security, and a seamless user experience.

custom_web_solutions.title: Custom Web Solutions
custom_web_solutions.description: From corporate websites to SaaS platforms, we build tailored solutions that scale with your business.

mobile_first_development.title: Mobile-First Development
mobile_first_development.description: We create lightweight, fast, and intuitive mobile apps using React Native & Flutter for seamless iOS and Android experiences.

powerful_backend_systems.title: Powerful Backend Systems
powerful_backend_systems.description: Leveraging Node.js, Express, Laravel, and MongoDB, we design scalable & secure backends to handle complex operations.
